channel.title: A couple probelms help please
channel.description:
1st: solved myself
2nd: how do i add spec to dbow
3rd: where is weapon attack timing located at,
4th: how do i fix it so when i cast barrage it hits instantly insted of a 3 second pause
5th: how do i fix it where if im attacking i cant barrage i have to stop attacking and then barrage then attack again.
6th: how can i make it so you dont have to use runes for veng. thank you guys in advanced
a little bit of info. well it seems like im using a deltascape source D: i know its kinda old o well.
